pages.title: Creating Budding Onyx
pages.text: Crafting [Onyx](book://general/onyx_shards) was always very tricky, as it depended on the current phase of the moon. Despite the [Crescent Clock](book://magical_items/crescent_clock) being a thing, you often missed that short time window.\\Making Onyx growable like the other gems will save you a huge amount of time.\\_Strangely, the same procedure does not seem to work for the others?_

pages.title: Spirit Inst. Recipe
pages.text: Even if it seems expensive, having renewable Onyx seems worth it.\\Best to craft a larger amount of these [Midnight Aberrations](book://general/midnight_aberration) all at once, as they seem to crumble in your hands quickly.
